review: WOW!! I have been dying for a smart TV but being that my tv is fairly new I cant buy another one. This product is amazing. There are so may free apps and movie apps that I just love. Seriously, KUNGFu movie app. Drive-In Movie App. Oh and an app for just scary movies...ALL FREE. Initially I had to call amazon because it wasn't working so that was a little frustrating but hang in there if it happens to you.Its definitely worth it.I don't have amazon prime but now I am contemplating getting it just because of all the movie options..

review: PROS:The apps and presentation of movies and synopsis is "high tech" in  appearance.It was easy to install and navigate.It arrived on time and is $10 cheaper then all the other TV streaming media players.CONS:The video or movie will CONSTANTLY  need to "rebuff" or. "Reload". (Has nothing to do w the Internet connection)I highly recommend purchasing a ROKU. I hav a ROKU for each television in my house and never had problems. The only reason I purchased this Fire stick was because it was $10 cheaper and I was interested in trying something new.
